p: Tetrapleura tetraptera fruits were obtained in the afternoon of April 2016 at the Department of Botany and authenticated at the same Department of Botany, Obafemi Awolowo University, Ile-Ife, Nigeria, in a geographical coordinates 07°30′59.46″ North and 04°31′42.82″ East (Voucher number: IFE17720). The fruits were sundried (65 % humidity), powdered and 600 g was soaked for 72 h in 70 % methanol with constant stiring at every 12 h. It was then sieved with a cloth of 100 μm pore size and further filtered with Whatman filter paper no. 1. The filtrate was concentrated in a rotary evaporator and further concentrated to dryness to obtain the extract (TT). The percentage yield of the extract was 11.6 % of dried plant material. It was dissolved in distilled water and DMSO for biological activity and cell culture experiments, respectively.
